requirements.summary: Revert LoginPage component to Version 10 state by removing the centered card layout, 'Welcome Back' heading, subtitle, email/password input fields with icons, green 'Sign In' button, 'Don't have an account? Sign up' link, and 'Back to Home' link, while preserving Internet Identity authentication functionality
acceptanceCriteria: All Version 11 login design changes are removed
Internet Identity authentication functionality remains intact
Users can successfully authenticate using the restored interface

file_operations.description: Revert LoginPage component to Version 10 implementation by removing the centered card layout with 'Welcome Back' heading, 'Sign in to your Salad Khatora account' subtitle, email and password input fields with Mail and Lock icons, green 'Sign In' button styling, 'Don't have an account? Sign up' link, and 'Back to Home' link. Restore the previous simpler login interface that existed before Version 11 while maintaining the Internet Identity authentication integration (useInternetIdentity hook, login function, and redirect logic). Ensure the component continues to use the authentication context and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
